explains: adj. 古怪的，异乎寻常的；不同圆心的，不正圆的
wordGroup: eccentric gear 偏心轮；偏心装置

sentences.en: Most people considered him a harmless eccentric.
sentences.cn: 多数人都认为他是一个无伤大雅的怪人。

sentences.en: Her fey charm and eccentric ways were legendary.
sentences.cn: 她让人捉摸不定的魅力和无厘头的作风是个传奇。

sentences.en: He is an eccentric character who likes wearing a beret and dark glasses.
sentences.cn: 他是个怪人，喜欢戴贝雷帽和墨镜。
